name: queenly
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
like a queen, or suitable for a queen: She smiled at him, trying not to lose her queenly dignity.
More examplesFewer examplesOnce again Blanchett embodies both queenly and vulnerable human emotions.She is a real glamor girl these days, queenly yet approachable.It still thrills me to know my queenly mother did something improper at least once.He gives his two older daughters adequate shares of the kingdom, but he has a queenly share for his youngest, Cordelia.
